characterDescription:
Sakin is the wife of the lighthouse keeper, Puuli. She had thought herself quite high and blessed when she'd landed her new husband. She'd moved into the man's fine stone hut in a prime spot for growing a garden behind the northern cliffs of the town.
She weeps as Puuli tells her that the storm that had passed was truly tragic, even as he is secretly happy about it. She weeps for her husband.
